media:group.media:title: ⚠️ 꿈속의 도망
media:group.media:description:
​무서운게 딱좋아 '꿈속의 도망' 편 이전의 이야기를 재해석하여 리코와 함께 그려볼 기회를 가지게 되었습니다.
[웹툰 '무서운게 딱좋아'] ▶​ 웹툰 링크: https://c11.kr/wjtz ▶​ '꿈속의 도망' 편 보기 : https://c11.kr/wju0 ​▶​ 음원 듣기 : https://youtu.be/wM4isU8Okqw ​​ [Credit] ▶​ Original Webtoon by '무서운게 딱좋아' Dong Kyu Lee Link : https://url.kr/d3at41 ​ ▶ Animation & Music produced by LICO ​ ▶Director : VIVINOS
▶Co-Director :​ QMENG ​​ ▶Compositing : Park Minseon Kim Seung ah
▶2D Animator : Son Young Eun ​Pyo Ju Hee Jang Si Jun ​Bam5​ Callnong Jung Yu Jin ​ ▶Art :​ Nam Jeong Sook Park Seul Gi ​ ▶3D Animator : Kim Jong Hoon​ PURPLE DUCK Lee Kang Cheol Kim Seung Rae Kim Shin Hyueng Lee Dong Kyu ​ ▶Manager : LEE PD​ Lee Kyu Young ​ ​▶ Support : Choi jina Jang Sooyeon Sim Yujin
▶ Music : Music Director by Do Sung Il​ Arranged by XENOVIBE Composed by XENOVIBE & DiBL Lyrics by XENOVIBE & DiBL Vocal by HyoBin Bass by Paulo ​ ▶ Executive Producer : Shin Hee Young ​ ▶ Producer : Kang Kyung Min ​ ​

media:group.media:title: 🖤 墜ちる満月 ✞ ~Chi no squi~
media:group.media:description:
▶Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/VIVINOS?fan_landing=true
▶MR download : https://bit.ly/31RN0GR ▶Song (clean) download : https://bit.ly/30s3dBF MR과 BGM은 커버용으로 사용이 가능하며, 상업적 목적의 사용은 금지됩니다.
▶Director QMENG ( https://youtube.com/c/QMENG규멩 ) ( https://twitter.com/1920x1080pixel )
▶Music Producer ko.yo ( https://koyobeats.com ) ( https://twitter.com/koyobeats1 )
▶Vocal Ellin ( https://twitter.com/ellin_0u0 ) ( https://www.youtube.com/c/Ellin0u0 )
▶Lyricist Dohee ( https://twitter.com/D0hee_ ) ( https://youtube.com/c/DoheeKim )
▶Compositing Deirector Sun lee ( https://youtube.com/c/SunLee ) ( https://twitter.com/sunlee_97 )
▶Key Animator/Clean-up Callnong ( https://twitter.com/callnong05 )
▶Manager LEE PD ( https://twitter.com/LEE_PD_KR )
#PINKBITCHCLUB
▶Lyrics むかしむかし、翼が欠けた純白の天使がいました。その名前は― 神々も見放した エリンジウムの花園 彷徨い続けた闇の中― 月が果汁を流したその下で、 我が心に届く 運命の鐘が響いた。
鏡、命、破壊、救い、神に問う 赤い嫉妬に染まる天使は罪を食う かなわぬ祈りを身に抱いて ひざまずいて神を探すparanomare
浮ぶ記憶 胸を溶かす 甘い罠 連れて出して アツい愛を 呑み干して 囁き 誘う 世界(アクマ)の声に 少女は惚れて 翼をちぎって 逃げました、嗚呼
枯れる罪の花 乱される夜の果て 血の救い 蘇る ピカレスク 痛みは生の証
満たされない 体を締め付ける 振り向かないイデア
ヨラナタイ イカシアナ ウソノテデイワデヲタダシ
十字架の下で花咲く裁きの嬌音(ソプラノ) 誰も知らない 天の向こうへ 夜明けを導く 鎭魂曲(フィナーレ) 我が名はシャーロット、その役目は― 神の
代理人/対敵者
💔 PBC 다이어리 굿즈 펀딩 link 🔽 https://link.tumblbug.com/OA0IpXIoBlb
